titleStmt.title: A vindication of Lieut. Gen. Cromwell, and Com. Gen. Ireton, against the scandalous aspersions cast upon them in a posted libell signed by one Tompson. And likewise a true state of the case concerning the said Tompson. / By A.C.
titleStmt.author: A. C.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
